description: 1. https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/nginx-ubuntu-16-04-ru    2. https://khashtamov.com/ru/how-to-deploy-django-app/ ### Machine Learning in diagnosis   1. [Datasets](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/datasets.html)   2. [Machine learning open course](https://habrahabr.ru/company/ods/blog/326418/) ## Deploying First of all it's important to clone project into local directory ```bash git clone https://github.com/reactmed/reactmed.git  ``` You can use SSH instead HTTPS ```bash git clone git@github.com:reactmed/reactmed.git ``` Then you have to install python 3 and pip ```bash sudo apt-get update  sudo apt-get install python3 sudo apt-get install python3-pip ```
